1.title: On the Waterfront
1.plot: Gabe visits Ricky Robbin, captain of the Lil' Rick shrimp boat in St. Bernard Parish LA. Drops anchor at Redd's Pond Boatworks in Marblehead MA. Then rides tugboats, the workhorse of the harbor, at Miller's Launch in Staten Island NY.

2.title: Local Eats and Drinks
2.plot: Gabe goes lobstering at The Barnacle in Marblehead MA. Tastes the local delicacy of boudin at Ray's Grocery Plus in Lafayette LA. And delivers fresh milk to your doorstep with Smith Bros Farms in Kent WA.

3.title: Sounds of the South
3.plot: Gabe goes Cajun with KVPI in Ville Platte LA. Visits Memo's on the legendary Big Nine in Chattanooga TN. And hears the story of bluegrass at The Mountain Opry in Signal Mountain TN.

4.title: Gearheads
4.plot: Gabe goes to Vintage Steele, a motorcycle shop in Brattleboro VT. In Vancouver WA, he meets the oldest car club in America, the Slo-Poks. At Pittsburgh's Pennsylvania Motor Speedway, Gabe to meet local drivers.

5.title: Tried and True Blue
5.plot: Gabe creates t-shirts for three metal work businesses that honors American industry and its blue collar spirit.

6.title: All About Gabe
6.plot: Gabe visits Hull-Oakes Lumber Co in Monroe OR. Jams with Mahalo Amps outside of Atlanta GA. And meets up with art collective Electric Coffin in Seattle WA.

locations: Louisiana, USA::(Shrimp boat, Boudin Trail, Fred's Lounge)
Marblehead, Massachusetts, USA::(Barnacle, Redd's Pond Boatworks)
Staten Island, New York, USA::(Miller's Launch)
Chattanooga, Tennessee, USA::(Memo's Chopped Weinies, Mountain Opry)
Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, USA::(PA Speedway, Liberty Welding, Williamsport Foundry)
imdb.plot outline: Gabe Johnson travels the country visiting small town American businesses. He listens to their stories and creates T-Shirts inspired by the businesses and the heroes behind them. He then sells these shirts and gives a portion of the profit back to the businesses. By doing so, he promotes small town businesses, puts money back in their pockets, and keeps the American Dream alive.
imdb.title: Made from America
plot: Gabe Johnson travels the country visiting small town American businesses. He listens to their stories and creates T-Shirts inspired by the businesses and the heroes behind them. He then sells these shirts and gives a portion of the profit back to the businesses. By doing so, he promotes small town businesses, puts money back in their pockets, and keeps the American Dream alive.::Lindsey
